title: Google Search dark theme goes fully black for some on the web
content:
To date, Google’s dark themes have been more gray than the pitch/AMOLED black preferred by some. Google is now testing a completely black dark theme for Search on desktop web.

more…

The post Google Search dark theme goes fully black for some on the web appeared first on 9to5Google.
